subtasks.title: Plan and Design
subtasks.description: Create architectural blueprints and detailed plans for the home, including layout, materials, and budget.

microtasks.title: Conceptual Design
microtasks.description: Develop initial ideas and sketches for the home's design.

microtasks.title: Architectural Blueprints
microtasks.description: Create detailed blueprints, including floor plans, elevations, and sections.

microtasks.title: Materials Selection
microtasks.description: Choose building materials, including flooring, roofing, siding, and fixtures.

microtasks.title: Budgeting
microtasks.description: Develop a detailed budget for the entire construction project.

subtasks.title: Land Preparation
subtasks.description: Prepare the building site by clearing land, leveling the ground, and installing necessary utilities.

microtasks.title: Land Clearing
microtasks.description: Remove trees, shrubs, and other vegetation from the building site.

microtasks.title: Grading and Leveling
microtasks.description: Level the ground and ensure proper drainage.

microtasks.title: Utility Installation
microtasks.description: Install water, sewer, and electrical lines.

subtasks.title: Foundation
subtasks.description: Pour the foundation for the home, ensuring it is level and structurally sound.

microtasks.title: Formwork
microtasks.description: Build the forms for the foundation.

microtasks.title: Pouring Concrete
microtasks.description: Pour the concrete into the forms.

microtasks.title: Curing and Inspection
microtasks.description: Allow the concrete to cure and inspect for any issues.

subtasks.title: Framing
subtasks.description: Construct the frame of the house, including walls, floors, and roof.

microtasks.title: Wall Framing
microtasks.description: Build the exterior and interior walls.

microtasks.title: Floor Framing
microtasks.description: Construct the floor joists and subfloor.

microtasks.title: Roof Framing
microtasks.description: Build the roof trusses and sheathing.

subtasks.title: Exterior Finishes
subtasks.description: Install roofing, siding, windows, and doors.

microtasks.title: Roofing Installation
microtasks.description: Install roofing shingles or other roofing material.

microtasks.title: Siding Installation
microtasks.description: Install siding on the exterior walls.

microtasks.title: Window and Door Installation
microtasks.description: Install windows and exterior doors.

subtasks.title: Interior Finishes
subtasks.description: Install insulation, drywall, flooring, fixtures, and paint.

microtasks.title: Insulation
microtasks.description: Install insulation in walls, ceilings, and floors.

microtasks.title: Drywall Installation
microtasks.description: Hang and finish drywall.

microtasks.title: Flooring Installation
microtasks.description: Install flooring materials (carpet, hardwood, tile).

microtasks.title: Fixture Installation
microtasks.description: Install plumbing and electrical fixtures.

microtasks.title: Painting
microtasks.description: Paint interior walls and trim.

subtasks.title: Final Inspection and Cleanup
subtasks.description: Conduct a final inspection to ensure all work meets standards and clean up the construction site.

microtasks.title: Final Walkthrough
microtasks.description: Perform a final walkthrough to identify any deficiencies.

microtasks.title: Deficiency Correction
microtasks.description: Correct any deficiencies found during the final walkthrough.

microtasks.title: Site Cleanup
microtasks.description: Remove construction debris and clean the site.
